titles.title: Glorify Thy Name in all the Earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father, we love You
We worship and adore You
Glorify Thy Name in all the earth

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glorify Thy Name
Glorify Thy Name
Glorify Thy Name in all the earth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, we love You
We worship and adore You
Glorify Thy Name in all the earth

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit, we love You
We worship and adore You
Glorify Thy Name in all the earth
